name: Pardon My Cheesesteak
address: 686 Morris Park Ave, Bronx, NY 10462, USA

reviews.text: Disgusting and horrible. As a republican, I wouldn’t recommend this place to a democrat.

My food was catastrophic. I ordered a cheesesteak and the meat was stale, the fries weren’t even fries, for god sake even the soda was somehow stale. NEVER AGAIN will I order from here and if you want to save yourself the trouble, cook at home or order from your local bodega because I bet my bottom dollar it’ll be better than this.
Overprice and small portion of food oh well didn’t enjoyed nothing total disappointment.

Trash… straight trash. Ordered a classic cheesesteak and it was a salt bomb, no flavor but salt. Best part of the sandwich was the bread. And they added ketchup — don’t know if that’s their thing or what but I certainly didn’t ask for it. Annoyed…
